title: As a Karthus main
body: Please fucking revert Dark Harvest, I do not enjoy seeing a balanced champ become a prime target for being hit with the nerf hammer just because balance team decided to push this stupid and broken change through.

Predator is ok, but it takes longer to charge up, which doesn't matter all the time but sometimes it is important, doesn't really help in laning phase, and doesn't provide infinite scaling. Plus the reset on kill for dark harvest means you can keep abusing it in teamfights. Overall, the only real benefit from going predator is that you're able to zoomzoom to other lanes and throw down your wall for pretty good ganks, but damage wise harvest is way better.

Sure, balance team is hot garbage and definitely not saints by any means, but let's not excuse designers of their design mistakes or shitty designers of their shitty designs while using the balance team as a crutch.

Not all champions are “fair at all levels of play” though and that’s a poor metric of what makes a broken or balanced kit.

Garen, Xin, Yorick (according to Riot), Yi, etc all thrive at low elo and get worse with the ranks.

Inversely, Pyke and Akali are not utilized well by low elos but broken at high level play.

Are we really going to be calling everyone’s kit “pure cancer” and unbalancable? Because people said that about Zoe at release, but she’s been neutral after several number tweaks.
